subject: Speed Skating
lead_paragraph: The Olympic champion Shani Davis narrowly lost to Stefan Groothuis of the Netherlands in the opening 1,000-meter race of the World Cup season in Berlin. Groothuis finished in 1 minute 9.13 seconds, 0.20 ahead of Davis. Simon Kuipers was third in 1:09.30.
